project.name: kollavarsham
project.description: Convert Gregorian date to Kollavarsham date and vice versa

BaseDate.name: BaseDate
BaseDate.description:
Serves as the base class for both the {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} and
{{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} classes.

 **INTERNAL/PRIVATE**

JulianDate.name: JulianDate
JulianDate.description:
Represents a Julian date's year, month and day
`toGregorianDateFromSaka` method of the {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham"}}{{/crossLink}} class returns an instance of this type for dates
older than `1st January 1583 AD`

 **INTERNAL/PRIVATE**

KollavarshamDate.name: KollavarshamDate
KollavarshamDate.description: Represents a Kollavarsham date's year, month and date

SakaDate.name: SakaDate
SakaDate.description: Represents an Saka date's year, month and paksa and tithi

Kollavarsham.name: Kollavarsham
Kollavarsham.description:
The Kollavarsham class implements all the public APIs of the library.

Create a new instance of this class, passing in the relevant options and call methods on the instance.

params.name: options
params.description: A set of key value pairs to configure the Kollavarsham instance. All settings are optional.

props.name: system
props.description: Set to 'InPancasiddhantika' or 'SuryaSiddhanta' to use the corresponding system

props.name: latitude
props.description: Sets the latitude for the location for the conversions. Defaults to Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh

props.name: longitude
props.description: Sets the longitude for the location for the conversions. Default to Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh

classitems.description: The year corresponding to this instance of the date.
classitems.name: year

classitems.description: The month corresponding to this instance of the date.
classitems.name: month

classitems.description: The date corresponding to this instance of the date.
classitems.name: date

classitems.description: The gregorian date corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: gregorianDate

classitems.description:
The `Julian Day` corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
Julian day is the continuous count of days since the beginning of the Julian Period used primarily by astronomers.

_Source_: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Julian_day
classitems.name: julianDay

classitems.description:
The `Ahargana` corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**

In Sanskrit `ahoratra` means one full day and `gana` means count.
Hence, the Ahargana on any given day stands for the number of lunar days that have elapsed starting from an epoch.

_Source_: http://cs.annauniv.edu/insight/Reading%20Materials/astro/sharptime/ahargana.htm
classitems.name: ahargana

classitems.description: The `Saura Masa` (Solar Calendar Month) for this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: sauraMasa

classitems.description: The `Saura Divasa` (Solar Calendar Day) for this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: sauraDivasa

classitems.description: The `Naksatra` (Star) for this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: naksatra
classitems.type: { { saka: String, enMalayalam: string, mlMalayalam: string } }

classitems.description: Returns the Saura Masa name for the current instance of date.
Returns the weekday (in English) for the current instance of date.
classitems.name: weekdayName

classitems.description: Returns the weekday (in Malayalam) for the current instance of date.
classitems.name: weekdayName

classitems.description: Converts the Date to a nicely formatted string with year, month and date
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: Returns the month names object that has Saka, Saura and Kollavarsham (English & Malayalam) month names for the specified index `masaNumber`
Returns the Kollavarsham Naksatra name (in English) for this instance of SakaDate
Returns the Kollavarsham Naksatra name (in Malayalam) for this instance of SakaDate
The Kali year corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: kaliYear

classitems.description: The Adhimasa (`Adhika Masa`) prefix corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: adhimasa

classitems.description: The fractional `Tithi`corresponding to this instance of the date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: fractionalTithi

classitems.description: The hour part from the sunrise time for this date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: sunriseHour

classitems.description: The minute part from the sunrise time for this date. **Set separately after an instance is created**
classitems.name: sunriseMinute

classitems.description: Returns the Saka year on this instance of SakaDate (same as the underlyiung `year` property from the {{#crossLink "BaseDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class)
classitems.name: sakaYear

classitems.description: Returns the tithi on this instance of SakaDate (same as the underlyiung `date` property from the {{#crossLink "BaseDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class)
classitems.name: tithi

classitems.description: Returns the Vikrama year corresponding to the Saka year of this instance.
classitems.name: vikramaYear

classitems.description: Returns the Saka Naksatra name for this instance of SakaDate
classitems.name: naksatraName

classitems.description: Returns the month name for this instance of SakaDate
Generates an instance of {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} from this instance of SakaDate
classitems.name: generateKollavarshamDate

classitems.description: Holds the settings state of the Kollavarsham instance. To access a snapshot use the {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/getSettings:method"}}{{/crossLink}} method
classitems.name: settings

classitems.description: Gets a snapshot of the current settings
classitems.name: getSettings

classitems.description: Sets the system to be either 'InPancasiddhantika' or 'SuryaSiddhanta'
classitems.name: setSystem

classitems.description:
Sets the latitude for the location that will be used as the basis for the conversion.
The value of the latitude parameter should be within -90 to +90
classitems.name: setLatitude

classitems.description:
Sets the longitude for the location that will be used as the basis of the conversion
The value of the latitude parameter should be within -180 to +180
classitems.name: setLongitude

classitems.description: Converts a Gregorian date to the equivalent Kollavarsham date, respecting the current configuration
classitems.name: fromGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Gregorian date to be converted to Kollavarsham

classitems.description:
Converts a Kollavarsham date (an instance of {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}}) to its equivalent Gregorian date, respecting the current configuration.
This method Will return {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} object for any date before 1st January 1583 AD and
[Date](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date) objects for later dates.

 **This API has not been implemented yet**
classitems.name: toGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Kollavarsham date to be converted to Gregorian

throws.description: **"When the API is implemented, will convert <date>"**

classitems.description:
Converts a Saka date (an instance of {{#crossLink "SakaDate"}}{{/crossLink}}) to its equivalent Gregorian date, respecting the current configuration.
This method Will return {{#crossLink "JulianDate"}}{{/crossLink}} object for any date before 1st January 1583 AD and
[Date](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date) objects for later dates.
classitems.name: toGregorianDateFromSaka

params.name: sakaDate
params.description: The Saka date to be converted to Gregorian

classitems.description:
Exports the {{#crossLink "KollavarshamDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class for referencing via `require`. This is the class
that is returned when converting {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/fromGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}} and is passed in
to {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/toGregorianDate:method"}}{{/crossLink}}. See example below.
classitems.name: KollavarshamDate

classitems.description:
Exports the {{#crossLink "SakaDate"}}{{/crossLink}} class for referencing via `require`. This class's instance needs to be passed in
to {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/toGregorianDateFromSaka:method"}}{{/crossLink}}. See example below.
classitems.name: SakaDate
